messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Enemy communication intercepted. Security level elevated.

A summary has been copied and printed to all communications consoles.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Anomaly Alert

Pyroclastic anomaly detected on long range scanners. Expected location: Mining Dock.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Anomaly Alert

Gravitational anomaly detected on long range scanners. Expected location: Security Post - Engineering.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Migration Alert

Due to bad luck, not more than 15 [REDACTED] have migrated into the [REDACTED].

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Anomaly Alert

Unstable bluespace anomaly detected on long range scanners. Expected location: Genetics Lab.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Anomaly Alert

High levels of radiation detected near the station. Maintenance is best shielded from radiation.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Anomaly Alert

The radiation threat has passed. Please return to your workplaces.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Lifesign Alert

Unknown biological entities have been detected near Space Station 13, please stand-by.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Anomaly Alert

Gravitational anomaly detected on long range scanners. Expected location: Port Primary Hallway.
